dict.string:
#ifndef __DEBUGCOM_H__ #define __DEBUGCOM_H__
#define __FILE_FNAME_ONLY__ (strrchr(__FILE__,'/')+1)
#ifdef DEBUG
#define METHOD_S NSLog(@"%s(%d):%s [START]", __FILE_FNAME_ONLY__, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__) #define METHOD_E NSLog(@"%s(%d):%s [END]",__FILE_FNAME_ONLY__, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__) #define DLOG(fmt, ...) NSLog([@"%s(%d):%s " stringByAppendingString:(fmt)], __FILE_FNAME_ONLY__,__LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ##__VA_ARGS__) #define DERR(fmt, ...) NSLog([@"%s(%d):%s [ERROR]" stringByAppendingString:(fmt)], __FILE_FNAME_ONLY__,__LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
#else
#define METHOD_S #define METHOD_E #define DLOG(fmt, ...) #define DERR(fmt, ...) NSLog([@"%s(%d):%s <> " stringByAppendingString:(fmt)], __FILE_FNAME_ONLY__,__LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
#endif /* #ifdef DEBUG */
#endif /* #ifndef __DEBUGCOM_H__ */
